phrases: You are a rental girlfriend, are not you?
I have to shut that girl up, no matter what!
Can I take this to mean you are admitting it, Mr. Fake Boyfriend?
YOU-Uh, no, that is not it.
You are found guilty on all three charges!
Do not expect a stay on your sentencing!
I cannot let her tell Kuri about Mizuhara!
I do not want you following me all the way!
Because you are going to call Kuri?
I am not going to tell Shun-kun.
You are Kuri's girlfriend, so who knows how and when you will let it slip?
Gosh, this is such a pain!
I was told you two were a tight couple...
But then I learned she was a rental, so I just wanted to mess with you.
How did you find that out?
I bet you rented her for some shallow reason, anyway.
So why does it matter if people find out?
I got dumped by my first-ever girlfriend not long ago.
So I got lonely and rented Mizuhara.
But I am such an idiot, I went and introduced her to my family.
My gran was over the moon, because I have never been a popular guy.
Seeing her like that, I could not bring myself to tell her the truth.
So just... p-promise me that you will not tell anyone!
Why should I have to promise that?
Just say, I, Sarashina Ruka, promise not to tell anyone!
Sorry, but I have no choice.
I will do anything you want, so please!
I was so sure that people who went for rental girlfriends were shallow and superficial!
Wh-What do you think you are doing?!
You know I cannot just watch my bud's girlfriend get hurt!
If this gets out, it will because issues for Mizuhara, too!
I do not care about myself, but I do not want to see Mizuhara sad!
She may be a rental, but Mizuhara is...
the best girlfriend anyone could ask for!
I am a rental girlfriend, too.
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
If you do not hurry up
I will charge you for an extension
Who does that girl think she is?
And that stupid virgin's pissing hme off, too!
Not like they will last more than three months, anyway

Receipt Kinoshita Kazuya-sama Rent-A-Girlfriend Itemized Bill Base Fee/hrhhhhhh 5000 yen x1 hChoice Fee (Rookie)hhhhhhhhh5000 yen x1 hhCosts (City Limits)hhhhhhhhhhhh2000 yen x1 Total: 12,000 yen + taxes
That means she is less likely to tell Kuri.
But it is not out of the question, so we should not provoke her.
There are things you just cannot do, and putting a fellow pro at risk is one of them!
D-Do not yell at me over it.
Uh, so we are here at a restaurant together...
Is not this just a normal date?
Type:hhhh Younger Sister Idhhhhh Birthday: 8/26hhhhhhhh Sign:hh Virgohhhhhh
Sarashina Ruka, a younger-sister idol girlfriend.
She is with an agency that operates within Tokyo, huh?
I was curious about how she found out,
but it makes sense if she is a rental girlfriend.
She is probably searched my name before.
Man, I do not know how to face Kuri next time I see him.
We have to feign ignorance all the way.
You are having to lend me an ear, even though we are not on a date or anything.
You really are a nice girl.
I would never see you without a booking otherwise!
I really, really cannot have my grandma finding out about this job.
There is no guarantee that girl will not change her mind,
so let us keep an eye on those two as much as we can.
If anything happens, I need to sort it out!
I told him to meet me here at three!
I need to ask him when he is seeing Ruka-chan next.
I cannot worry about coming off as awkward.
Whoa, she is a total cutie!
Anyone can waltz into a college campus, huh?
Maybe people think I am a student here.
When you are dressed like that?
What if Kuri shows up now?
I am here to see you, Kazuya-san.
He went that way with a super cute girl.
If you want to talk, let us do it off campus!
I thought I heard his voice.
Can that guy teleport or something?
Things are getting worse and worse...
This are not the time to be messing with your phone!
I knew it... I was right!
How are we supposed to explain ourselves if he finds us together?
Wh-Why are the two of you together?
Y-You have got the wrong idea!
She is here to see you.
Kuribayashi-san, thank you for renting me the other day.
She just murdered him in cold blood!
Well, yeah, his friend just found out his girlfriend was a rental.
Of course he would want to crawl into a hole.
In front of both of you?
Not like there was another way to worm out of that situation.
But I feel so bad for Kuri-kun.
Still, this means he will not rent her anymore,
which reduces the chances of him finding out about us.
Uh, something about that girl bothers me.
It was like she would made up her mind about something.
She had this serious look on her face.
When we passed by here on a date, Kuribayashi-san told me...
That voice was Chizuru-san, was not it?
Why are you two so close?
She is a rental girlfriend, is not she?
You pay her to go on a date, and that is that!
That is the extent of your relationship, right?
I, Sarashina Ruka, promise here and now
that I will not tell anyone about your fake relationship or Mizuhara Chizuru-san's job!
But only if you go out with me, Kazuya-kun!
How did we get to that?
You are the first person to cross 90.
You should not mess with grown-ups like that!
You have no reason to fall for me!
Between what happened on the ferry and the double date...
It shocked me to see how much you care for Chizuru-san.
If you care so much for a rental girlfriend,
then you are sure to treat a real girlfriend even better!
Then you can go out with me!
If she is just a rental girlfriend, there should be nothing in our way.
There is no way that is happening!
You sure you should be coming out?
Who are you calling a mastermind?
Do you realize what you are saying?
Like Kazuya-san said, we have only kept up this rental relationship because we had no choice.
Even if you are serious, telling him that out of the blue is only going to throw him off.
He is even grabbed my boob!
Oh, uh, that was not what...
Does any girl work for you, as long as she is cute?!
It is not what you think!
Has he ever grabbed your boobs, Chizuru-san?
That means I have gotten further than you.
He embraced me without asking, then pushed me onto my back...
That and the boob thing happened at different times!
That does not make it okay.
That is not what I meant!
We cannot do this out here.
You are even frequenting his apartment?
If you are just a rental, would not you hesitate to enter a client's apartment?!
But you just walked in, which proves you have done it before!
Right, she did come in back then.
So much for just a rental!
Chizuru's a bad, bad lady I am going to tell her agency
You are getting down and dirty without telling your other clients or your agency!
I am sitting next to him!
I am not letting anyone else by his side!
Ruka-chan, give me five minutes to speak with Kazuya-san.
Who knows what you would do if I left you two alone?
Please give us some space, okay?
I cannot say no to you, Kazuya-kun.
Let us get this out of the way first.
That is inconsistent with her testimony.
It is the first time anyone's told me they like me.
Any guy would find her cute, and I am no exception.
But considering how Kuri'd feel, there is no way I could date her.
You should not go out with her, then.
If you let her have her way now, she will keep blackmailing you.
As the grown-up here, you need to face her without fear.
I thought you would say I should go out with her.
And the best way to do that would be for you to get a real girlfriend.
Let us get one thing straight.
Sure, that is my end goal,
but I can obviously understand you would be against getting a girlfriend in this fashion.
She is blackmailing you to go out with her.
Makes me doubt if she really likes you.
The one thing a significant other cannot lack is love for their partner.
We are not talking about a rental girlfriend here.
We need to do something to prevent her from spilling the beans.
You will tell Kuri-kun the truth?
And now, he will be willing to keep it on the down-low as a shared secret.
All I will tell him is that Mizuhara's a rental girlfriend.
That way, it will not affect your college life.
Nobody's realized that you go to our college.
Given how he must be feeling,
he would probably ignore my calls or texts.
I will talk to him in person.
He will find out you rented a girlfriend.
Well, I found out about him, so it is not fair that I get to keep my secret.
We can go get a drink and shoot the shit about rental girlfriends.
I am sure it will be a blast.
Dating her will not immediately put an end to this nightmare.
Were you trying to run away?
I find it hard to believe that this will make you happy!
You have no idea just how long I have been looking for Kazuya-kun!
Where do you think you are going?
You cannot run away from me!
Give up and just go out with me!
Please just give me a break!
I will apologize if I gave you the wrong idea!
And you can hit me all you want!
H-Hey, do not do this outside.
Even if you really do like me,
I cannot trample on Kuri's feelings like that!
But I just cannot do it!
Why do you have to be that against the idea?
Even I know that doing this would only get me on your bad side.
But you two are so glued together, I did not know what to do!
If you go out with me, I will not tell Kuribayashi-san anything, I swear!
Hey, can you stop crying for a second?
That is why I told you I was a rental girlfriend,
and that is why I broke it off with Kuribayashi-san!
I know that you like Chizuru-san!
I figured I had to do this to get you to date me!
No, you have that wrong, Ruka-chan.
I will not ask you to fall for me immediately,
and I do not mind if you only see it as a trial at first,
but please let me be your girlfriend!
I feel bad for you, but I do not want any more people finding out about my job.
Kuri-kun will not find out if nobody tells him.
It looks like she really does like you.
There is probably more to it than meets the eye.
Wh-What happened to what you were saying earlier?
What else are we supposed to do?
She is not likely to leave until you give her the okay!
It would be too risky to leave her to her own devices.
She even said she was okay with a trial period.
You should not get any more excited.
You will lose your breath again.
It is not that I should not...
I am a robot or something...
Yuu-kun and I kissed for the first time yesterday...
My heart was about to jump out of my chest!
Rental Girlfriend Maple Looking for Part-Timers
And so I got a girlfriend.
Hello, all of you watching Rent-a-Girlfriend!
I, Sarashina Ruka, and Kazuya-kun are going out now,
so I am going to be borrowing him from next week on...
The show needs to go on!
Besides, this is only a trial period.
Can you stay out of our lovey-dovey preview?
You are upset I stole Kazuya-kun from you, are not you?
Now, on the next episode of Rent-a-Girlfriend!
